examples Package¶

bayes_theorem Module¶

This is an example of the Bayes Theorem, in which to simple random variables are used in the calculation, X and Y.

earthquake Module¶

This is an example of using ProbPy to define a simple Bayesian Network and executing the Elimination Ask algorithm. The network is defined like so:

B E
/
A

/ J M

Each node of the network corresponds with the following Random Variables:
  • Burglary - P(B)
  • Earthq - P(E)
  • Alarm - P(A | B, E)
  • John - P(J | A)
  • Mary - P(M | A)

Their distributions are bellow.
